segments.text: What can I get for you ? Here is the menu .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me have a look . Well , how many kinds of steaks do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have sirloin steaks , pepper steak , and filet steak .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there something go with the filet steak ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have various sauces . What about the gravy ?
segments.speaker: S1
